column5: Hi all,  Can anyone recommend a place nearby honey harbour that will be broadcasting the fight? we will be staying at a friends cottage for the weekend and wanted to watch the big UFC fight on SAT.   THANKS !
they now start the fights an hour early 9pm
Maybe at the Delawanna Inn. Call them up and see if it will be on there at the bar.

Anyone know a place around Pointe au Baril that will be airing the fights as well?  I will hate to miss them.  Didn't think far enough ahead when I was planning my trip.  GO ST. PIERRE!   MIllhouse2020
Nope !! Just called !  looks like we might be out of luck ! !

Stay tuned to the website if you have a wifi connection...watched live streaming on the web for one of the recent PPV's and the link was posted on here I believe.  Would love to help at the time but I will be at the Rogers Centre during the fight
Ok spill it. You're really looking for a tv to watch the wedding.
